name: Sustainable by design
description:
Every design decision has an impact on how sustainable a building is – both in terms of embodied energy and the operational energy required to run the building.  This stream looks at how sustainability impacts design choices by examining:

how successful design teams work      together to a high sustainability brief
some exemplars of      energy-efficient, low-carbon buildings
how to design for productive      environments
how new eco materials can improve      a building’s embodied and operational energy usage
new innovations in sustainable      lighting design
